title: South Korea’s Innospace schedules December test launch carrying Brazilian military payload
summary: South Korean rocket startup Innospace announced May 3 that it will conduct its first suborbital test launch of flight hardware in December from the Alcântara Space Center in Brazil, carrying a Brazilian military payload.

title: NASA's Mars Helicopter Scouts Ridgeline for Perseverance Science Team
summary: The rotorcraft provided rover scientists an aerial perspective of an interesting rocky outcrop.

title: NASA chief says cost-plus contracts are a “plague” on the space agency
summary: "You get it done with that competitive spirit. You get it done cheaper."

title: Rocket Lab catches a 1-ton booster falling back from space
summary: "It's kind of like Ghostbusters in some way."

title: CAPSTONE up next for Rocket Lab
summary: A NASA lunar cubesat mission is now scheduled to launch in late May on a Rocket Lab Electron after resolving issues with the rocket’s kick stage.
